title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Clearly define the features, functionalities, and user requirements for the Virtual Courtroom platform.

title: Design the User Interface (UI)
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the UI of the Virtual Courtroom platform, ensuring it is intuitive and accessible.

title: Develop the Backend Logic
description: Design and implement the backend logic for managing court proceedings, evidence presentation, and witness testimonies.

title: Develop the Database Structure
description: Create a database schema for storing court proceedings, user data, evidence, and other relevant information.

title: Integrate Frontend with Backend
description: Connect the frontend UI to the backend logic, ensuring smooth data flow between the two components.

title: Test the Virtual Courtroom Platform
description: Perform thorough testing to ensure the platform is functioning correctly, addressing any identified issues.

title: Secure the Virtual Courtroom Platform
description: Implement necessary security measures to protect sensitive data and ensure privacy during court proceedings.

title: Write Documentation for the Virtual Courtroom Platform
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers, users, and administrators, detailing how to use and maintain the platform.
